article.headline: Western Carolina 94, Montreat Adrsn 66
article.story: CULLOWHEE, N.C. (AP) -- Rans Brempong scored a career-high 22 points to lead Western Carolina to a 94-66 win Monday against Montreat. David Berghoefer added 15 points and 11 rebounds for his first double-double of the season. Three other Western Carolina (2-5) players also scored in double figures. Corey Muirhead had 12, Trey Hopkins 11 and Antonio Russell 10. David Robinson of Montreat (1-6) led all scorers with 25 points. Noble Anthony chipped in 13 points and nine rebounds for the NAIA Cavaliers. Western Carolina led just 34-30 at halftime, but stepped up in the second half to score 60 points. The Catamounts outshot the Cavaliers 52 percent to 37 percent for the game, despite making just 3-of-14 attempts from 3-point range. Montreat hit 39 percent of its attempts behind a 7-for-15 performance by Robinson.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
